snippet: “Copper,” BBC America’s new series, tells the story of a police officer patrolling the Five Points neighborhood in post-bellum New York.
abstract: BBC America mini-series Copper tells the story of a police officer patrolling 19th-century New York City's Five Points neighborhood; program is the network's first original series, drawing inevitable comparisons to Martin Scorsese's film Gangs of New York.
lead_paragraph: “Copper,” BBC America’s new series, tells the story of a police officer patrolling the Five Points neighborhood in post-bellum New York.

headline.main: Slums of New York Teem With Life and Death
headline.print_headline: Slums of New York Teem With Life and Death
